titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral oe [sic] the incomparably vertuous and truly pious gentlewoman Mrs. Dorothy Litster. By Edward Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Edward, 1620 or 21-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.R. for Will. Palmer at the Palm-Tree in Fleet-street over against St. Dunstan's Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
